text: Prismacolor is a brand of professional artists' supplies. They were first made in 1938 by the Eagle Pencil Company. They are currently made by Newell Brands. Products in the Prismacolor are colored and graphite pencils, and soft pastels. Other products include erasers, pencil sharpeners, and cases. Prismacolor has also made watercolor paintings and charcoals in the past. ==Colors== Color (approximate) Hex Code (approximate) Issued Retired Notes 1 Amethyst #7A66A8 unknown 2 Apple Green #84BC60
